globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 2
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 3
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You arrive at the Krandt brothers’ safehouse, eager to obtain any information you can about Captain Solo and ready to negotiate.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Doors are locked to Imperial figures.
{-} The mission will progress when the Krandt brothers are found.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 7, or when all heroes are wounded.
Without hesitation, Chewbacca charges forward, bellowing. So much for negotiations.

abilities.name: Contempt
abilities.text: While attacking, if the target does not have a HARMFUL condition, Dengar applies +1 {B} to the attack results.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Doors are locked to Imperial figures.
{-} The mission will progress when the Krandt brothers are found.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 7, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
Thanks to your own cunning blend of traditional and “Wookiee-enhanced” interrogation techniques, the cowardly Krandt brothers reveal everything they know about Jabba and Solo.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive the “Strategy Executed” Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} The Empire discards the “Distractions” Reward card.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
The pair of trandoshans slip out behind a wave of advancing reinforcements. You retreat empty-handed, pursued by a hail of blaster fire.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} The Empire discards the “Distractions” Reward card.

globalEvents.name: Assault
globalEvents.eventText: You burst into the base to find guards accompanied by Imperial Officers. It seems the Empire has their own interest in keeping this intel buried.

entityProperties.name: Door Hallway
entityProperties.theText: An old transparisteel door leads into the Krandt Brothers' safehouse.

globalEvents.name: Bodyguards
globalEvents.eventText: Behind the second door lies a large automated forge. Construction droids are hammering metal parts with huge weights.

entityProperties.name: Door Forge
entityProperties.theText: This door leads deeper into the safehouse. The whirring of machinery and metallic clangs can be heard from behind.

eventActions.theText: The Krandt brothers have stationed their bodyguards here. You must be getting close.

globalEvents.name: Negotiations
globalEvents.eventText: You hoist open the door to a part of the old factory that has been converted into a bunker.

entityProperties.name: Door Bunker
entityProperties.theText: A sturdy door leads into what looks like a bunker.

eventActions.theText: The Krandt brothers, two huge Trandoshans, interrupt their discussion with a man in an Imperial uniform. They snarl and draw their weapons.

{-} When a Krandt brother is defeated, he becomes incapacitated instead. He cannot attack or voluntarily exit his space.
{-} A Rebel figure can interact with an incapacitated Krandt brother ({K} or {J}). Place 1 strain token on that Krandt brother for each success. When each Krandt brother has 2 or more strain tokens, they yield to the interrogation. If that happens, click the green highlight and select "Krandts yield".
{-} The Rebels win when the Krandt brothers yield to the interrogation.

entityProperties.name: Krandt Brother Highlight
entityProperties.theText: {-} A Rebel figure can interact with an incapacitated Krandt Brother ({K} or {J}). Place 1 strain token on that Krandt Brother for each success. When each Krandt Brother has 2 or more strain tokens, they yield to the interrogation. If that happens, click the green highlight and select "Krandts yield".

eventActions.theText: Make the Krandt Brothers yield to interrogation.

{-} When a Krandt brother is defeated, he becomes incapacitated instead. He cannot attack or voluntarily exit his space.
{-} A Rebel figure can interact with an incapacitated Krandt brother ({K} or {J}). Place 1 strain token on that Krandt Brother for each success. When each Krandt brother has 2 or more strain tokens, they yield to the interrogation. If that happens, click the green highlight and select "Krandts yield".
{-} The Rebels win when the Krandt brothers yield to the interrogation.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 7, or when all heroes are wounded.
